definitions.definition: Something which is limp or sagging .
A condition or posture of drooping.
examples: He walked with a discouraged droop .

definitions.definition: A hinged portion of the leading edge of an aeroplane 's wing , which swivels downward to increase lift during takeoff and landing .

main_definition: Something which is limp or sagging .
secondary_definitions: A condition or posture of drooping.
( aviation ) A hinged portion of the leading edge of an aeroplane 's wing , which swivels downward to increase lift during takeoff and landing .
